translations: adv.显著地，明显地；超群地，惹人注目地

phrs.translation: 显着地, 明显地, 超群地

sentences.sentence: Britain continues to follow U.S. policy in this and other areas where American policies have most conspicuously failed.
sentences.translation: 英国在这个以及其他领域继续跟随美国已经明显失败了的政策。

sentences.sentence: Its images, allusions, and diction are conspicuously remote from the common "range of utterance".
sentences.translation: 它的形象、典喻和措辞明显远离普通的“话语范围”。

sentences.sentence: This shows negative consequences of poor dietary intake can occur even when body weight has not changed conspicuously.
sentences.translation: 这表明，即使体重没有显著变化，不良饮食摄入也会产生负面影响。
